results.name: amount
results.label: Net price
results.description: The amount of a line item
results.calculationFormula: round_nearest(if is_present(hs_sync_amount) then hs_sync_amount else (if is_present(hs_pre_discount_amount) then hs_pre_discount_amount else 0 - if is_present(hs_total_discount) then hs_total_discount else 0), if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: createdate
results.label: Create Date
results.description: The date the line item was created

results.name: description
results.label: Description
results.description: Full description of product

results.name: discount
results.label: Unit discount
results.description: The discount amount applied

results.name: hs_acv
results.label: Annual contract value
results.description: The annual contract value (ACV) of this product
results.calculationFormula: round_nearest(if is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency)) then hs_arr else amount, if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_all_accessible_team_ids
results.label: All accessible team IDs
results.description: The team IDs, including up the team hierarchy, corresponding to all owner referencing properties for this object, both default and custom

results.name: hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids
results.label: Business units
results.description: The business units this record is assigned to.

results.name: hs_all_owner_ids
results.label: All owner ids
results.description: The value of all owner referencing properties for this object, both default and custom.

results.name: hs_all_team_ids
results.label: All team ids
results.description: The team ids corresponding to all owner referencing properties for this object, both default and custom.

results.name: hs_allow_buyer_selected_quantity
results.label: Allow buyer selected quantity
results.description: Whether buyer selected quantity is to be enabled or not for a LineItem

results.name: hs_arr
results.label: Annual recurring revenue
results.description: The annual recurring revenue (ARR) of this product
results.calculationFormula:
round_nearest(if is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency)) then ((amount / if string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'monthly' then 1
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'annually' then 12
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_three_years' then 36
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_two_years' then 24
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_six_months' then 6
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'quarterly' then 3 endif) * min(if is_present(hs_term_in_months) then hs_term_in_months else 12, 12)) else 0, if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_billing_period_end_date
results.label: Billing Period End Date
results.description: End date of a fixed billing period.

results.name: hs_billing_period_start_date
results.label: Billing Period Start Date
results.description: Start date of a fixed billing period.

results.name: hs_billing_start_delay_days
results.label: Delayed billing start by days
results.description: Number of days billing should be delayed by. It allows the customers to start billing sometime in the future

results.name: hs_billing_start_delay_months
results.label: Delayed billing start by months
results.description: Number of months billing should be delayed by. It allows the customers to start billing sometime in the future.

results.name: hs_billing_start_delay_type
results.label: Start billing terms
results.description: The type of billing start delay. It can be a fixed date in the future, relative delay in number of days or months
results.calculationFormula:
if (is_present(string(hs_recurring_billing_start_date)) and not (is_present(string(hs_billing_start_delay_days))) and not (is_present(string(hs_billing_start_delay_months)))) then 'hs_recurring_billing_start_date'
elseif (is_present(string(hs_billing_start_delay_days)) and not (is_present(string(hs_recurring_billing_start_date))) and not (is_present(string(hs_billing_start_delay_months)))) then 'hs_billing_start_delay_days'
elseif (is_present(string(hs_billing_start_delay_months)) and not (is_present(string(hs_recurring_billing_start_date))) and not (is_present(string(hs_billing_start_delay_days)))) then 'hs_billing_start_delay_months' endif

results.name: hs_cost_of_goods_sold
results.label: Unit cost
results.description: The amount that sold goods cost the HubSpot customer

results.name: hs_created_by_user_id
results.label: Created by user ID
results.description: The user that created this object. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_createdate
results.label: Object create date/time
results.description: The date and time at which this object was created. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_discount_percentage
results.label: Discount Percentage
results.description: The discount percentage applied

results.name: hs_external_id
results.label: External LineItem id
results.description: The ID of a line item

results.name: hs_images
results.label: Image URL
results.description: Product images.

results.name: hs_lastmodifieddate
results.label: Last Modified Date
results.description: The date any property on this product was modified

results.name: hs_line_item_currency_code
results.label: Currency
results.description: Currency code for the line item.

results.name: hs_margin
results.label: Margin
results.description: The margin value of this product
results.calculationFormula: round_nearest((amount - (if is_present(hs_cost_of_goods_sold) then hs_cost_of_goods_sold else 0 * if is_present(quantity) then quantity else 1)), if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_margin_acv
results.label: Annual contract value margin
results.description: The margin annual contract value of this product
results.calculationFormula:
round_nearest((hs_acv - if is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency)) then (((if is_present(hs_cost_of_goods_sold) then hs_cost_of_goods_sold else 0 * if is_present(quantity) then quantity else 1) / if string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'monthly' then 1
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'annually' then 12
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_three_years' then 36
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_two_years' then 24
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_six_months' then 6
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'quarterly' then 3 endif) * min(if is_present(hs_term_in_months) then hs_term_in_months else 12, 12)) else (if is_present(hs_cost_of_goods_sold) then hs_cost_of_goods_sold else 0 * if is_present(quantity) then quantity else 1)), if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_margin_arr
results.label: Annual recurring revenue margin
results.description: The margin annual recurring revenue of this product
results.calculationFormula:
round_nearest(if is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency)) then round_nearest((hs_arr - (((if is_present(hs_cost_of_goods_sold) then hs_cost_of_goods_sold else 0 * if is_present(quantity) then quantity else 1) / if string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'monthly' then 1
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'annually' then 12
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_three_years' then 36
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_two_years' then 24
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_six_months' then 6
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'quarterly' then 3 endif) * min(if is_present(hs_term_in_months) then hs_term_in_months else 12, 12))), if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3) else 0, if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_margin_mrr
results.label: Monthly recurring revenue margin
results.description: The margin monthly recurring revenue of this product
results.calculationFormula:
round_nearest(if is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency)) then round_nearest((hs_mrr - ((if is_present(hs_cost_of_goods_sold) then hs_cost_of_goods_sold else 0 * if is_present(quantity) then quantity else 1) / if string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'monthly' then 1
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'annually' then 12
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_three_years' then 36
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_two_years' then 24
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_six_months' then 6
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'quarterly' then 3 endif)), if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3) else 0, if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_margin_tcv
results.label: Total contract value margin
results.description: The margin total contract value of this product
results.calculationFormula:
round_nearest((hs_tcv - round_nearest(if is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency)) then ((if is_present(hs_cost_of_goods_sold) then hs_cost_of_goods_sold else 0 * if is_present(quantity) then quantity else 1) * (if is_present(hs_term_in_months) then hs_term_in_months else 12 / if string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'monthly' then 1
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'annually' then 12
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_three_years' then 36
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_two_years' then 24
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_six_months' then 6
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'quarterly' then 3 endif)) else (if is_present(hs_cost_of_goods_sold) then hs_cost_of_goods_sold else 0 * if is_present(quantity) then quantity else 1), if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)), if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_merged_object_ids
results.label: Merged record IDs
results.description: The list of record IDs that have been merged into this record. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_mrr
results.label: Monthly recurring revenue
results.description: The monthly recurring revenue (MRR) of this product
results.calculationFormula:
round_nearest(if is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency)) then (amount / if string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'monthly' then 1
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'annually' then 12
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_three_years' then 36
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_two_years' then 24
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_six_months' then 6
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'quarterly' then 3 endif) else 0, if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_object_id
results.label: Record ID
results.description: The unique ID for this record. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_position_on_quote
results.label: Position on quote
results.description: The order which the line item appears on the quotes

results.name: hs_post_tax_amount
results.label: Net Price after tax
results.description: Amount of line item after applying tax
results.calculationFormula: round_nearest(if is_present(hs_tax_amount) then (amount + hs_tax_amount) else amount, if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_pre_discount_amount
results.label: Pre Discount Amount
results.description: The pre-discount amount of a line item
results.calculationFormula: round_nearest((if is_present(price) then price else 0 * if is_present(quantity) then quantity else 1), if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_product_id
results.label: Product ID
results.description: ID of the product this was copied from

results.name: hs_product_type
results.label: Product Type
results.description: The type of product. By default, categorize your product as either Inventory, Non-Inventory or Service.

results.name: hs_read_only
results.label: Read Only Object
results.description: Is the object read only

results.name: hs_recurring_billing_end_date
results.label: Billing end date
results.description: Recurring billing end date for a line item

results.name: hs_recurring_billing_number_of_payments
results.label: Number of payments
results.description: Number of payments for the given period on a Line Item
results.calculationFormula:
if (is_present(string(hs_recurring_billing_period)) and is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency))) then round_up((period_to_months(string(hs_recurring_billing_period)) / if string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'monthly' then 1
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'annually' then 12
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_three_years' then 36
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_two_years' then 24
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_six_months' then 6
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'quarterly' then 3 endif), 0)
elseif not (is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency))) then 1 endif

results.name: hs_recurring_billing_period
results.label: Term
results.description: Product recurring billing duration

results.name: hs_recurring_billing_start_date
results.label: Billing start date
results.description: Recurring billing start date for a line item

results.name: hs_recurring_billing_terms
results.label: Billing terms
results.description: If there are fixed number payments or it goes on until cancelled
results.calculationFormula: if (is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency)) and not (string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals '')) then if (is_present(string(hs_recurring_billing_period)) and not (string(hs_recurring_billing_period) equals '')) then 'FIXED' else 'AUTOMATICALLY_RENEW' endif

results.name: hs_sku
results.label: SKU
results.description: Unique product identifier

results.name: hs_sync_amount
results.label: Sync amount
results.description: The amount set by Ecommerce sync

results.name: hs_tax_amount
results.label: Tax Amount
results.description: Amount of tax calculated based on tax rate for this line item
results.calculationFormula: round_nearest(if (is_present(amount) and is_present(hs_tax_rate)) then (hs_tax_rate * 0.01 * if is_present(amount) then amount else 0) endif, if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_tax_rate
results.label: Tax Rate
results.description: Represents tax rate as percent out of 100. Supports up to 4 decimal places

results.name: hs_tcv
results.label: Total contract value
results.description: The total contract value (TCV) of this product
results.calculationFormula:
round_nearest(if is_present(string(recurringbillingfrequency)) then ((amount / if string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'monthly' then 1
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'annually' then 12
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_three_years' then 36
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_two_years' then 24
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'per_six_months' then 6
elseif string(recurringbillingfrequency) equals 'quarterly' then 3 endif) * if is_present(hs_term_in_months) then hs_term_in_months else 12) else hs_acv, if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_term_in_months
results.label: Term in months
results.description: The number of months in the term of this product

results.name: hs_total_discount
results.label: Calculated Total Discount
results.description: Calculated total Discount for the line item taking in consideration the flat amount and discount percentage.
results.calculationFormula:
round_nearest(if is_present(discount) then (discount * if is_present(quantity) then quantity else 1)
elseif is_present(hs_discount_percentage) then (hs_discount_percentage * 0.01 * if is_present(hs_pre_discount_amount) then hs_pre_discount_amount else 0) else 0, if is_present(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) then if is_present(currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code))) then currency_decimal_places(string(hs_line_item_currency_code)) else 3 else 3)

results.name: hs_unique_creation_key
results.label: Unique creation key
results.description: Unique property used for idempotent creates

results.name: hs_updated_by_user_id
results.label: Updated by user ID
results.description: The user that last updated this object. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_url
results.label: URL
results.description: Product url.

results.name: hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_followers
results.label: User IDs of all notification followers
results.description: The user IDs of all users that have clicked follow within the object to opt-in to getting follow notifications

results.name: hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_unfollowers
results.label: User IDs of all notification unfollowers
results.description: The user IDs of all object owners that have clicked unfollow within the object to opt-out of getting follow notifications

results.name: hs_user_ids_of_all_owners
results.label: User IDs of all owners
results.description: The user IDs of all owners of this object

results.name: hs_variant_id
results.label: Variant id of the product
results.description: Varient id of the shopify product

results.name: hs_was_imported
results.label: Performed in an import
results.description: Object is part of an import

results.name: hubspot_owner_assigneddate
results.label: Owner Assigned Date
results.description: The most recent date an owner was assigned to this object. This is set automatically by HubSpot and can be used for segmentation and reporting.

results.name: hubspot_owner_id
results.label: Owner
results.description: The owner of the object.

results.name: hubspot_team_id
results.label: HubSpot Team
results.description: The primary team of the owner.

results.name: name
results.label: Name
results.description: Product name

results.name: price
results.label: Unit price
results.description: Cost of product

results.name: quantity
results.label: Quantity
results.description: How many units of a product are in this line item

results.name: recurringbillingfrequency
results.label: Billing frequency
results.description: How often a line item with recurring billing is billed. It informs the pricing calculation for deals and quotes. Line items with one-time billing aren’t included.

results.name: tax
results.label: Tax
results.description: The tax amount applied
